channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [BHS1][Dedicated Servers] - Racks 80A10 - 80A11 - 80A12 - 80A04
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jun 25, 04:00 - 11:00 UTC

May 14, 22:17 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Baremetal offer.

Start time : 25/06/2024 04:00 UTC
End time : 25/06/2024 11:00 UTC
Service impact : Each server in racks 80A10 - 80A11 - 80A12 - 80A04 will be unreachable during the maintenance
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we will be moving servers in racks 80A10 - 80A11 - 80A12 - 80A04

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [RBX1/RBX2][Dedicated Servers] - Servers migration from RBX1 to RBX2
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jun 2, 22:00 UTC  -  Jun 5, 05:00 UTC

May 17, 03:56 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 02/06/2024 22:00 UTC
End time : 05/06/2024 05:00 UTC
Service impact : Servers being moved from RBX1 to RBX2 might be unavailable for up to 7 hours during the night (22:00 UTC => 05:00 UTC).
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will have to move servers from RBX1 to RBX2 due to the EoL (End of life) of RBX1.

Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [Global][Dedicated Servers] - API call removal
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT May 30, 08:30 - 08:45 UTC

May 2, 15:37 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our API.

The 30th of May 2024, the following API call will be definitely removed:
GET /dedicated/server/{serviceName}/install/templateCapabilities

Start time : 30/05/2024 08:30 UTC
End time : 30/05/2024 08:45 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : This API call was previously useful for old Windows OS installers that were not compatible with installation on another diskgroup on servers with multiple diskgroups. Since then all OSes can be installed on any diskgroup.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [ERI1/LIM1/LIM3/SBG3/SBG5/SGP1/SYD1/WAW1][Dedicated Servers] - Boot Firmware Maintenance
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT May 20, 09:00 - 10:00 UTC

May 14, 20:11 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our infrastructure.

Start time : 20/05/2024 09:00 UTC
End time : 20/05/2024 10:00 UTC
Service impact : This maintenance may affect reboots to disk or in rescue mode for servers running very old hardware
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our servers, we will be changing the boot firmware of legacy boot servers in ERI1/LIM1/LIM3/SBG3/SBG5/SGP1/SYD1/WAW1 from SYSLINUX to iPXE.


Thank you for your understanding.

End time : 17/05/2024 23:05 UTC

Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

item.title: [SBG5][Dedicated Servers] - Rack SBG0506B07A/SBG0506B07B
item.description:
May 17, 16:30 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 17/05/2024 06:15 UTC
End time : 17/05/2024 15:43 UTC
Root cause : Electrical malfunction
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

May 17, 12:15 UTC
Update - All servers in rack SBG0506B07B are operational.
Our technical teams are currently working on the last impacted servers in rack SBG0506B07A.

May 17, 09:27 UTC
Update - Our technical teams replaced the network equipment. Private network is available for servers SBG0506B07A.
Some servers are unavailable in racks SBG0506B07A and SBG0506B07B.

May 17, 08:37 UTC
Update - Service impact : Private network is temporarily unavailable for servers in rack SBG0506B07A and some of these servers are temporarily unreachable.
Also, servers in rack SBG0506B07B are temporarily unavailable.
Our technical teams are still working on the issue.

May 17, 07:32 UTC
Update - Servers in rack SBG0506B07B are temporarily unavailable.

May 17, 07:16 UTC
Identified - Start time : 17/05/2024 06:15 UTC
Service impact : Private network is temporarily unavailable for servers in rack SBG0506B07A
Root cause : Electrical malfunction caused the incident
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are currently working to solve the issue.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
